channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Coby Testing Mermaid Diagram
item.description: This is a post by Coby testing out a mermaid functionality. This is what you would type in the .MD file: {{<mermaid align="left">}} graph LR; A[Coby] -->|Testing| B(Mermaid) B(Mermaid) --> C{Push to Github} C -->|One| D[Github creates Container] C -->|Two| E[Builds & Deploys Website on Push] {{< /mermaid >}} Thereafter Hugo will render it as follows: graph LR; A[Coby] -->|Testing| B(Mermaid) B(Mermaid) --> C{Push to Github} C -->|One| D[Github creates Container] C -->|Two| E[Builds & Deploys Website on Push]
